<h3 id="X32271">X(32271) = ORTHOLOGIC CENTER OF THESE TRIANGLES: EHRMANN-MID TO WALSMITH</h3>
Barycentrics<br>
4*(b^2+c^2)*a^10-(7*b^4-2*b^2*c^2+7*c^4)*a^8-2*(b^4-c^4)*(b^2-c^2)*a^6+2*(4*b^8+4*c^8-(5*b^4-4*b^2*c^2+5*c^4)*b^2*c^2)*a^4-2*(b^6-c^6)*(b^4-c^4)*a^2-(b^4-c^4)^2*(b^2-c^2)^2  :  :

<br>
<b>X(32271) = 3*X(4)+X(11061) = 3*X(5)-2*X(6698) = X(20)-3*X(15462) = X(67)-3*X(381) = X(74)-3*X(14561) = 3*X(113)-X(5181) = X(146)+3*X(14853) = 3*X(182)-4*X(32300) = 3*X(265)-X(25335) = X(895)+3*X(10706) = X(895)-3*X(20423) = X(1350)-3*X(14643) = 3*X(1352)-X(32244) = X(2930)-3*X(5655) = 5*X(3091)-X(32247) = 3*X(5476)-2*X(15118) = 3*X(5476)-X(32305) = 3*X(9970)-X(11061) = 3*X(10752)+X(32244) = X(11579)-3*X(14853)</b>
<p>
The reciprocal orthologic center of these triangles is X(125).</p>
<p>X(32271) lies on these lines:
{4,542}, {5,2781}, {6,7728}, {20,15462}, {23,5642}, {30,6593}, {67,381}, {74,14561}, {110,7519}, {113,511}, {125,5169}, {146,11579}, {182,1177}, {265,25335}, {382,15140}, {389,16003}, {541,5476}, {546,32274}, {611,12374}, {613,12373}, {858,12824}, {1350,14643}, {1351,14982}, {1352,10752}, {1478,32290}, {1479,32289}, {1503,1539}, {1511,29181}, {2854,21850}, {2930,5655}, {3091,32247}, {3098,5972}, {3583,32297}, {3585,32243}, {3589,12041}, {3618,12244}, {3843,32306}, {5085,20127}, {5092,16111}, {5480,5663}, {7527,10990}, {7530,12584}, {7540,30714}, {9818,32262}, {9955,32238}, {10296,13202}, {10510,18325}, {10605,15128}, {10895,32307}, {10896,32308}, {11178,32257}, {11444,18504}, {11645,15303}, {12061,14984}, {12699,32278}, {13665,32253}, {13785,32252}, {14483,18125}, {16163,29317}, {16176,32272}, {17702,19139}, {18491,32256}, {18492,32261}, {18495,32265}, {18497,32266}, {18500,32268}, {18502,32242}, {18507,32279}, {18509,32280}, {18511,32281}, {18516,32287}, {18517,32288}, {18520,32295}, {18522,32296}, {18525,32298}, {18538,32303}, {18542,32309}, {18544,32310}, {18553,32275}, {18761,32270}, {18762,32304}</p>
<p>
X(32271) = midpoint of X(i) and X(j) for these lines: {i,j}: {4, 9970}, {6, 7728}, {110, 31670}, {146, 11579}, {382, 32233}, {1351, 14982}, {1352, 10752}, {10510, 18325}, {10706, 20423}, {12699, 32278}, {16176, 32272}, {18507, 32279}, {18525, 32298}<br>
X(32271) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (125, 19130), (3098, 5972), (5642, 25566), (12041, 3589), (12584, 16534), (16003, 20301), (16111, 5092), (32238, 9955), (32274, 546), (32275, 18553), (32305, 15118)<br>
X(32271) = X(67)-of-Ehrmann-mid-triangle<br>
X(32271) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (146, 14853, 11579), (5476, 32305, 15118)<br>
</p>
